projects.title: My
projects.subtitle: Here is a selection of my projects

russian_travel.title: Russian Travel
russian_travel.description: Project created as part of the Yandex.Practicum Web Developer program. This is a responsive website developed using the Nested BEM file structure methodology.

mesto_russia.title: Mesto Russia
mesto_russia.description: An interactive web application that allows users to share their photos. Users can add new photo cards, like, delete cards, edit their profile, and includes login and registration forms.

diploma_project.title: Diploma Project
diploma_project.description: A diploma project completed as part of the Yandex.Practicum Web Developer course.

old_portfolio.title: My Portfolio (old)
old_portfolio.description: This project is a web portfolio created to showcase my skills and projects.

palc_project.title: Project for Palc Band
palc_project.description: A frontend project for the Palc band website, developed using React and React Router. It includes multiple pages with information about the band, tours, merchandise, and gallery.

calculator.title: Calculator
calculator.description: A simple (or not so simple) web calculator. The project is written in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
